title: Prachtig Schoonhoven in 1920 in kleur! Beautiful Schoonhoven in 1920 in color! [Enhanced& Colorized]

sources.title: Prachtig Schoonhoven in 1920 in kleur! Beautiful Schoonhoven in 1920 in color! [Enhanced& Colorized]
sources.description: Schoonhoven is a town in the Dutch province of Zuid Holland which is famous for its silver smiths since the 14th century. Already in 1247 a town called "Sconhauen" was mentioned in old documents. This film shows the picturesq old town and one of its silverware factories. One of its points off interest nowadays is the "Dutch Silver Museum Schoonhoven". This film has been motion-stabilized, speed-corrected, enhanced and colorized with modern video software. Source B&W film: Beeld En Geluid. Music: Trevor Kowalski
